DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Renal Arterial Sympathetic Denervation Cryotherapy
DOC.detailed_description: Non-randomized study 5 subject select prophylactic open surgery due abdominal aortic aneurysm . During surgery renal artery side identify subjected 60 second freeze application liquid nitrogen dedicate catheter around circumference artery . Renal arterial blood flow check Doppler freezing procedure , surgery . Another 5 patient subject freeze therapy serve control . Main outcome change 24h ambulatory blood pressure level course safety parameter creatinine level .
